name: Dungeon Pain Maniac (itch)
description:
DPM: Dungeon Pain Maniac is an 8-bit game for true fans of hardcore platformers. 

Only the chosen few will manage to complete the game, and the rest will burn with hatred. Thrown by the will of destiny into the dungeon filled with deadly traps, you will have nothing but your skill to rely upon. 

Do you think you have what it takes to escape?
